sentences.en: Crowds at Tel Aviv's main square added to the growing call for withdrawal from the war-torn territory.
sentences.cn: 特拉维夫大广场上的人群进一步呼吁从这个饱受战争蹂躏的地区撤军。

sentences.en: Afghanistan will play soccer at the Asian Games. Mongolia's withdrawal has given the war-torn nation a confidence boost.
sentences.cn: 阿富汗将参加亚运会足球比赛，蒙古的退出给这个饱受战争摧残的国家带来了信心。

sentences.en: For the Princess, the trip to this war-torn country was an excellent opportunity to use her popularity to show the world how much destruction and suffering landmines can cause.
sentences.cn: 对王妃来说，这次对这个饱受战争蹂躏的国家的访问会是一个绝佳的机会来利用她的声望向世界展示地雷能造成多大的破坏和痛苦。
